### Tender Notice
**Title**: 21401-250016 Industrial Multi-Load Washers and Dryers
================================browser =
**Reference Number**: WS4701788001-Doc4702083759

**Tender Status**: Annulé
**Procurement Category**: Goods
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
**Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
**Trade Agreements**: This procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and others.
**Regions of Opportunity**: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
**Delivery Region**: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
**Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
**Contact Information**: David Barltrop, david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice Description
Amendment to Closing Time
Please disregard the initial Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuy posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted no later than **2024-08-21** by **2:00 PM EDT**. Bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

The Correctional Service of Canada is seeking offers to provide supply, delivery, and installation of industrial multi-load washers and dryers, on an "as and when requested" basis, to various institutions throughout Ontario. Successful bidders will be awarded a standing offer contract.

### Unspsc Classification
* 31161800: Washers and Dryers
* 47111502: Laundry type washing machines
* 47111503: Clothes dryers

### Eligibility Criteria
Bidders must be eligible under the applicable trade agreements listed above.

## Attachments
None

## Closing
Please see the attached notice for detailed instructions.
